definition: ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to sing the praises of/to extol/to eulogize
bassoon (loanword)/also written 低音管[di1 yin1 guan3] or 巴松管[ba1 song1 guan3]
A Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens
lit. praise fills the roads (idiom); praise everywhere/universal approbation

sentences.english: The background music for the recitation is a variation of the song "Ode to Red Flag".
sentences.chinese: 《紅旗頌》的變奏是詩朗誦的音樂背景。

sentences.english: I wonder if any of them are singing wedding songs.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道是否他們的孩子中有唱婚禮頌的呢。

sentences.english: Ray did not live to see the summer of year 2000, he passed away that spring at the age of fourteen.
sentences.chinese: 暐頌在他十四歲時去世，無緣見到公元二千年的夏天。

sentences.english: Time Domain Encoding and Frequency Domain Decoding Techniques for RS Code;
sentences.chinese: 樣板戲《龍江頌》的解碼分爲自由解碼和規範解碼。

sentences.english: It's a holy ceremony, it's done just like this in front of chanting priests.
sentences.chinese: 這是神聖的儀式，在吟頌咒咒文的法師跟前就這樣做。

sentences.english: Summer Day is his most favorite painting that he painted at the age of eleven.
sentences.chinese: 《夏日》是暐頌最心愛的畫，在他十一歲時所繪。

sentences.english: "Yanan Song" became the symbol of the spirit of Yan'an.
sentences.chinese: 《延安頌》由此成爲延安精神的象徵。

sentences.english: It's a holy cerony, it's done just like this in front of chanting priests.
sentences.chinese: 這是神聖的儀式，在吟頌咒咒文的法師跟前就這樣做。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Jing Xing below, I had composed a new gatha.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子敬行以下之提請，我已作一新偈頌。

sentences.english: The verdict removes Prime Minister Somchai Wongsawat from office.
sentences.chinese: 法庭裁決解除了頌猜的總理職務。

sentences.english: The artistic model of Peking opera of " Long Jiang song " s decoding is divided into decoded standardized and decoded freely.
sentences.chinese: 樣板戲《龍江頌》的解碼分爲自由解碼和規範解碼。

sentences.english: 61-year-old Somchai is the brother-in-law of the ousted Thaksin Shinwatra.
sentences.chinese: 現年61歲的頌猜是前總理他信的妹夫。

sentences.english: And beauty making beautiful old rhyme.
sentences.chinese: 還有香豔美人們古老的頌詠。

sentences.english: In your bhajans you sing of me as being the ancient one.
sentences.chinese: 在你們的唱頌裏，你們以至古者來歌頌我。

sentences.english: The poem is entitled Ode to Skylark .
sentences.chinese: 這首詩的題目是《雲雀頌》。

sentences.english: One line rushing out to go to school, see grandpa with praise and waiting for her.
sentences.chinese: 朵索趕着出門上學，看到外公帶着頌和烏在等她。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
